description:
Deep beneath guild HQ, Alina and Silver Sword find the "man in black," who finally reveals his identity.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: It May Be a Trap, but I Have to Keep Moving Forward
Meglehet, hogy csapda, de tovább kell mennem
Wana kamo Shirenai Desu ga, Mae e Susumu Shikanai to Omoimasu
罠かもしれないですが, 前へ進むしかないと思います
